website_summaries.verdict: Losing onboard attachments such as crevice tools is no longer a concern with this portable Dirt Devil home and car vacuum. Power cord is long enough to plug into a garage's outlet and reach every part of the vehicle comfortably.
pros: Combines the steady power of a corded upright vac with the versatility of a handheld vac
16 foot power cord is long enough for automotive cleaning
cons: Motor is often described as extremely noisy
Has a long power cord that is not easy to wrap for storage
Some concerns about variable suction power

website_summaries.verdict: A handheld vacuum that has the power to tackle small spills and stairs.
pros: Flip-out crevice tool works well for cars or stair crevices
Long cord gives a good working radius

website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and surprisingly powerful little bagless vacuum cleaner, but it does require a cord.
pros: Overall design of this model is less than 4 pounds, which is impressive
Ships with a 16-foot power cord to give you a lot of space when working
Has a 2.5-foot hose and an integrated crevice tool that's easy to use
Collects soils in a canister instead of a bag
cons: Doesn't have a battery option, which limits the portability of this style of vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Great for guinea pig cages
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean out the fleece bedding in my guinea pig's cage. Works perfectly. I suggest getting some extra filters because it can get gross pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this solely based on good reviews and i guess the reviews below are for ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand how this item got such reviews. I purchased this solely based on good reviews and i guess the reviews below are for sure paid reviews. The main problem with this item- It front end of the vacuum is very loose and many time fell on my feet when trying to remove some dust on floor. So please be careful while using this item. A few weeks ago i was not surprised when i saw this item on recall at the local walmart supercenter.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't take the time to write amazon reviews, but I was blown away by how powerful this little vacuum is. It picks everything up no matter what size and very quickly! Makes vacuuming so easy for me in my dorm room
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase. It does exactly what I need it to, and even comes with all the extra little parts to do things I didn't expect it could. I will say, it's incredibly loud for such a small device, but it is a vaccume after all. But yes, for my small bedroom it's absolutely perfect. No more mess! (added a picture with one of the nifty add-ons to reach the tiny little spaces)
customer_reviews.author: LadyStarlight

customer_reviews.title: Crevice tool broke off but powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: I own a cleaning company but I wanted a small hand vac for only crevices every once in a while and for my own home. The suction was so powerful I was amazed as I have tried other hand vacs and they weren’t anywhere near as sturdy as this one. However when the crevice tool broke off after only a few uses I was disappointed particularly since I cannot seem to find a replacement part and I do not wish to spend another $30 on another while vacuum! I was pleased with the performance but dissatisfied with the durability overall. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi K

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.text: terrible vacuum average suction and dust gets past filter to recirculate back into area that you are trying to clean. shuts down after about 5 minutes of use as it gets to hot then you need to wait for it to cool down. Complained to company and they had no help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never go back to a cordless hand-vac
customer_reviews.text: There is no reason to ever have a cordless hand vacuum or dust buster. Why did they become so popular? The battery is always dead or dying, and the ugly thing is mounted prominently on your wall or stuck somewhere in a corner near an outlet. Get this thing instead. The first time you feel a corded hand vac kick in your hand when you turn it on, you will understand. This thing is really strong, and it is always ready to go because it doesn't depend on a battery on a battery. Store it in the closet, take it out when you need it. The cord is long and durable. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jonloft

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, powerful
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this. I like that it has a cord and the battery will not wear out. I have bought at least 7 battery-operated handheld vacuums by different companies and they never hold their suction. The one is lightweight, easy to use, and I can tell it will last. Best of all, my 5 year old likes using it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: A Screaming buy at $27
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and I love it. Im using it for cleaning tables and work benches. The Dirt Devil was the original great design for hand helds, and this one extends that line. The pooir reviews may be expecting a full power vacuum cleaner. This is a vacuum for getting into crevices and table tops where most vacuums are inconvenient to use. Im even thinking of using it in a machine shop to get lathe particles and other cutting debris. I read some reviews that claim 2,000 good reviews are all fake. I can't see how that many could fool Amazon. I think I know where the fake news is about that.
customer_reviews.author: Manthano

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: It was nearly worthless from the get-go. When I first received it, the suction was fine, but the tip has a very uneven surface, so it would leave streak lines in the dust, no matter how many times I'd go over it. Plus, it indiscriminately blows dirt/dust/pet hair all over the place, unless you hold it just right. I couldn't just vacuum, I had to hold it at a weird angle so it didn't make a bigger mess than I started with. But I babied it along, cleaned it often, used it sparingly....3 months later, it's DEAD. Overheats, won't even pick up a feather from our down comforter. And I'm a month past the return window. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken, unusable after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this vacuum for a few months and the flip out crevice tool broke at the hinge the second time I used it. The vacuum is very hard to clean out, and small particles and hair get wrapped up in the bottom of the canister where they cannot be removed easily. Despite taking good care of the vacuum, changing out the filter, and frequent cleanings, the suction power on it has decreased to the point where it cannot be used. The unit also gets very hot after using it for only a few minutes. I would not recommend this vacuum to anyone and it was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin DKZ

customer_reviews.title: HOLY CRAP WHAT A STRONG VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I dont usually leave reviews. But this little guy is strong.It has a full size vacuum motor on it. when i plugged this thing in i had left it on when playing with the switch. It had more that enough torque to roll its self over and almost off my desk!!! The handy built in nozzle makes it great for quick clean up. if i had to change one thing. it would be the quick nozzle had a small attachment with bristles on it that can be removed but also stored on the unit that flips down making keyboard clean and car messes easy. I would buy this 10 times over.
customer_reviews.author: wade

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the suction power of this vac. The problem is the crevice tool broke off after only about 5 uses. It works OK, but the crevice tool helped with the suction power, especially when cleaning the interior of the car. Should have lasted a lot longer than 5 uses.
customer_reviews.author: JRod AL

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but the nose comes off quite easily and unexpectedly when you are fiddling with the little ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful but the nose comes off quite easily and unexpectedly when you are fiddling with the little nozzle at the tip of the nose. I've had it happen a few times when I'm trying to flip out the little nozzle and the whole thing comes off and dumps all the crap all over the floor...pretty terrible. As other reviewers mentioned, the air the shoots out from the side regularly hits you in the face and is annoying. Aside from that, it's super powerful and suctions up everything.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: bah.... just a bad experience.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed, had it for one day and then it quit working. Seemed fine out of the box, but the next day I was using it to sweep up underneath my desk, and it just stopped working. I will be returning it; I"m not even going to chance a replacement. Had this been a Christmas present, I probably would have wound up eating it. Rule of thumb: Never buy electrics or clothes online, I've al;ways had a bad experience and it just isn't worth the time wasted. I will be supporting local retailers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vac!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum. I have another Dirt Devil product so I thought I would give this a try. I was not disappointed. I previously purchased another brand of cordless hand-held vacuum and the suction power was almost non-existent. Not this little guy! You get much better suction with a corded product. It's a little loud (like the other Dirt Devil product I have) but I expected that. It gets the job done. Dirt, dog hair, sand, leaves.... it gets them all. The cord is generously long so I have no problem using it inside or outside. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nanasaurous

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't seem to have much suction
customer_reviews.text: This is small, easy to manoever and the cord is long so it is quite versatile. Ther eason I give it only three stars is that it doesn't seem to have very good suction. I tried using it to vacuum up kitty litter on a hard floor, and it just barely picked any up at all. I was using the brush, but that shouldn't make the suction zero. I think I might research more any buy another one. This good good reviews, but I am quite surprised given the poor suction.
customer_reviews.author: charliegg

customer_reviews.title: Best product in this price range...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have ever bought from Amazon with this price range. I have been using those very poorly designed Black & Decker cordless hand vacuum for years until I found this product, it's a God send. Black & Decker cordless hand vacuum don't even last 5 minutes of use after a full charge which require probably 24 hours to fully charged, it's stupid. This Dirt Devil little guy don't need to charge, you just plug into your wall outlet and use as often as you want, what a great concept. It has tons of power and many useful tools and attachments that came with it. Amazing product, 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marvel

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! Way more power than I expected in a vacuum so small!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works really well. Better than our big vacuum with a hose attachment to get into tight spaces and awkward places. It does fill up pretty quickly, but that's because it does a great job. I would recommend getting the extra filter so that when yours gets dirty, you can knock the dust off it and clean the sponge material with your faucet and while it's drying you can keep on working with the 2nd filter. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil that has the suction power to get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dirt Devil to clean the carpeting in my vehicles, but it has proved strong enough to do a better job in the house than the current cordless vacuum that cost twice as much. Very pleased with the quality and efficiency of this vac.
customer_reviews.author: HighSierra49er

customer_reviews.title: FILTER DUMPS OUT WITH THE DIRT! REPLACEMENT PART DOESN'T FIT! ONE TIME USE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Great power and suction, worked great for big clean up job...but then my husband took it outside to dump out the dirt cup into the dumpster, and when he came back in and turned it on, dirt flung everywhere! That's when he realized that the filter went in the trash with the dirt! I figured no biggie, the guide lists the replacement filter. So I bought the filter, we go to replace it and then find that it doesn't fit anywhere! This is ridiculous I bought the EXACT specified replacement part from the same dirt devil brand! This is the ULTIMATE RIPOFF. The "replacement" part alone btw was an additional 8 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: 2CatMomma

customer_reviews.title: not enough suction
customer_reviews.text: This things gets heated after few mins and doesn't have enough suction, also dirt gets thrown out from the sides creating more mess
customer_reviews.author: RP2

customer_reviews.title: Always has power
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a corded vacuum like this because cordless handhelds always seemed to have issues with their batteries. And this one always has power, once plugged in obviously. The cord is quite long, so I haven't ever had an issue with reaching where the vacuum is needed. Its suction seems fine for the jobs (sawdust, hair, etc.), although I will say it's rather loud, which speaks for its power, but also a bit annoying, so you don't want to use for long cleanups.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonStreich

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS POWERFUL LITTLE BEAST
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s dorm room, tested and liked it so much I ordered one for my house and I might get a 3rd for our workshop too! For the price I didn’t expect much, man I was PLEASANTLY surprised! It’s much more powerful than high priced vacs. Super powerful! Much more so than cordless vacs. Sucks up pet (German Shepherd) hair and dog food like a champ! Just look at the pic! Lightweight Easier on stairs than a standard vac Hose attachment is awesome, most hand bags don’t have this feature! Gets into crevices, great for the car! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Loud but good
customer_reviews.text: Great all around. - good suction - small and lightweight (for my six year old) Cons: - super loud. I bought it for my six year old to use. I have her using ear plugs. - doesn’t come with a bag or anywhere to coil the wires so you have the wire going everywhere. It would be nice if they made something to coil the wire on the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: ekim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Amazing suction work and the cords are very long so it doesn't limit me when vacuuming around the bedroom. It is loud, however, it's very powerful. I recommend for those that don't mind the noise or having a cord. I prefer this over the cordless Black and Decker vacuums I purchased previously (it was the number one rated on Amazon, but the suction was not very good and the battery life was poor). It just wasn't doing the job and I had to call it quits with that one after 1 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoLucky

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d like this product, but turns out I LOVE it. Don’t waste your time with battery powered vacuum cleaners. They just don’t have the power or suction capabilities. This little baby is small, but so very powerful. The attachments are just a bonus. I use the little flip attachment almost exclusively that’s already attached. I’m going to be putting this in my travel bag to go back and forth to my lake house. We have a boat and can’t wait to use it there. It’s small and so powerful. Marvelous device.
customer_reviews.author: sharont

customer_reviews.title: Quite heavy, very, very loud and the on/off ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite heavy, very, very loud and the on/off switch is difficult to operate. I'm really sorry I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: weak suction
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. I didn't use it until after the return period had expired. Otherwise I would have returned it. The suction power is extremely weak. You can go over a thread on the carpet 10 times and the thread remains on the carpet. The crevice tool broke the first time I used it. I am going to give it to ARC or Goodwill and research other brands so that I buy a more powerful, sturdy one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: LOUD as other reviewers have mentioned. But it picks up a lot of debris that my old battery-operated dust-buster couldn't. Usually cuz those old dust-busrers couldn't hold much of a charge. Looove knowing that this guy won't die on me before the mess is cleaned up. I wear earplugs when I run mine. Seriously, it's that loud. Shoulder strap included is a nice addition to help me carry the weight of it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Neal

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a USED product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping it because it works but it clearly came used. There were crumbs in it, the cord was covered in dust, the attachments were jus thrown in the box. I bought a New one and they sent me a used one. They could have at least cleaned it before they sent it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got sick and tired of cordless/ battery hand held vacuums that had no power and always had to be charged! This thing has the power and since we were always charging the cordless what's the difference if we were always using the plug?? Took away a star because of the design, if you are not careful it could easily break.....very easily!! I recently bought a corded drill because of the power and you NEVER have to worry about the battery level!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT VACUUM FOR SMALLER MESSES.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has a pretty powerful suction on it. Has no issues sweeping up dog food and hair. Having a mount for it would make it near perfect! I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a powerful vacuum. I chose the corded over battery to get longer life out of it. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Strong little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I bought it because I was tired of sweeping up cat litter surrounding my cats litter box. The strength of this vacuum is incredible. It sucks the litter up with no problem what so ever. The quality of the vacuum is superb. The only thing I can see some people complain about (doesn't bother me) is how loud this unit is. When turned on, it is fairly loud, but I bought it strictly to pick up cat litter so i typically don't use it for more than 40 seconds at a time. Oh and I also love that it is corded so I don't need to worry about charging/bad batteries in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hand held vaccum that I could use on furniture for dog hair and also on window sills and other narrow areas. The suction on this is great...better than I expected. It has an attached extension with a nozzle as well as one that you can attach which has a hose too. Small enough to tuck away on a shelf. It is lightweight and handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction , easy to clean , long power cord
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a bit loud , BUT this is the first time I actually don't mind it at all because of great it does its job. The suction power is a lot stronger than expected given that its handheld. Easy to empty container, with attachments you can attached or a built in extender for tighter spaces. One little thing I came to really appreciate is that the long power cord allows me to move across the room a lot more than other brands. It does tend to heat up fast
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little devil!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little devil! We use this for cleaning the guinea pig cage and it works pretty well. Definitely much better than the cordless mini-vac we used before. So while the cord can be a hassle, it is long... so you can reach all around a room... and it gives it extra power for the pick-up. It comes with a brush and extended attachment. We have not used the brush, but the extender we use to get corners of the cage. I supposed this would be very useful for cleaning hard to reach areas like cushions as well. All in all very useful for us and I'd buy it again. [...]
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea

customer_reviews.title: Great vac and good value
customer_reviews.text: The power of this corded vac is far superior to battery operated hand-vacs. It appears to be well-made, has a strong motor and a good filter system that's easy to clean. The extra long 16' cord is a nice addition too. Battery vacs have their place but if you need power and suction then this is the way to go. The price can vary, as is the case with many online products these days, so a little patience might pay off.
customer_reviews.author: blueline

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this vacuum cleaner after reading all the positive reviews. I was trying to clean a small area of carpet shown in the picture. It temporarily stopped working after the very first use. It worked fairly well in the first small patch I used but started overheating relatively quick and making loud noises. The square footage of the carpet in the picture is less than 50 square feet. Unfortunate that it can not clean such a small area of carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Usman

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum REALLY sucks, and that is a good thing!
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful hand-held vacuum. This picks up some things that the accessory hose on my full-size upright vacuum has trouble with. Motor is powerful enough that there is a bit of a gyroscope effect when moving it around (where there is some resistance to changing the direction it is pointing). Nice long power cord - Between just 2 outlets I can reach pretty much anywhere in my apartment. Chose this over a rechargeable because most rechargeables have weak suction, poor battery life & short usable time before needing recharged. (If someone could make a rechargeable vacuum with this kind of power that could actually hold a charge they would have a real winner).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can NOT get replacement filters
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from Amazon with bundled filters. Wrong filters ( for earlier model ) Tried to order correct F117 filters, Amazon does not have them. Dirt Devil website is backordered, calling them was no help , 20 minutes waiting then disconnected, spoke to rep , no help. So far I have a Hand Vac I like , but only one filter. Not too happy, with Amazon and Dirt Devil.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Loud and useless
customer_reviews.text: I'm very surprised at all the positive reviews this vacuum has received. It is extremely loud (much more than larger vacuums) and its extremely ineffective. I bought it planning to simply use it in one tiled room but its no ineffective that it doesn't even do a good job in that one easy area.
customer_reviews.author: Hhs

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Good service, arrived on time. I'm tired of the weakling battery powered ones, though they are very portable. This has power and a nice long cord to move around the house and even out to the truck with an extension cord. So much power it jerks in your hand when you turn it on. I keep it by the fireplace - not for the ash, but for the dirt/ junk that falls off logs and kindling. It also reaches the couch for those cracker crumbs (TMI?). Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: iemusic

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect for the smaller jobs that don’t require a large vacuum cleaner. It has a couple attachments plus a very long cord. Mostly I use this for vacuuming the stairs and cleaning up all the feathers from my crazy bird!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline B.

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 battery operated handheld vacs and none satisfied me. Little power and only lasted about 15 seconds before quitting. Even though this has a cord (a very long cord!) I would never again buy a battery operated one. This vac has the most power of any vacuum of any style I have purchased ever! The flip down tube is okay but will probably never use it because the power is decreased using it. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a small, potentially stylish dustbuster, (think Dirt Devil KURV) that could help around the kitchen. While this thing isn't stylish, it sure does help! For it's small size it's incredibly powerful, although a little loud, and handy. It got into even the tiniest of cracks around my stove, to the back of the kitchen cabinets and everywhere in between. I removed a star because there's really no good way to store this stylishly and the cord is a little awkward; however, I'm thrilled with the purchase. The side exhaust issue, discussed by other reviews, if definitely there, but I just hold the vacuum a bit higher and it isn't really a problem.
customer_reviews.author: seeJsave

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apartment with hardwood floors and do not have space for a big vacuum. I bought this vacuum because of the good reviews and I am SO glad that I did. This thing is so powerful and consistent. The only down side it that it is a bit loud. I will gladly deal with the noise every so often to have a sparkling clean apartment. I frequently use the flip down portion for those hard to reach areas. The cord is long and is of good quality. This product has served me well for over three years, I highly recommend this item !
customer_reviews.author: Anna C. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Powerful Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I was too tired of battery powered portable vacuum cleaners because their batteries gone bad over the short period of time. (didn't matter if it was NiCd or Li powered) This little dirt devil captured my eyes because it is corded and bagless design. I used it on my cars and it was quite effective and cleaned easily. For barely $30, you can't beat this. Although it gets hot pretty easily and loud, it does the job pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Mon. Eric

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: I love my little dirt devil. I do not know how I’ve gone so long without one. It has great suction power, is fairly lightweight. Easy to empty and clean. It does need to be plugged in, and can get quite warm if in for too long. I have a dog, and I craft, so there’s always lots of little pieces of paper or glitter. This does a great job of picking up hair and paper.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE

customer_reviews.title: Not much sucking power
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a Dyson so perhaps it isn't fair for me to compare the sucking power of this hand vacuum but it seriously lack suction power as I bought it to use in my car and it has trouble sucking up all the dirt and fur from my kids and multiple dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Butterbug's Mom

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Virtually useless. Can't even pick up crumbs off of low carpet or even the couch. The only things I use it for now are the dryer vent and my space bags, but I had to get separate attachments for each.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Basta

customer_reviews.title: A LITTLE LOUD, BUT IT'S A BEAST AT CLEANING
customer_reviews.text: This tiny thing will surprise you the first time you turn it on, cause it's pretty loud! HOWEVER don't let it deter you cause this thing cleans like a freakin BEAST! The suction is really good, like pulling loose carpet off the ground good! Buy some earplugs with this bad boy and you're in for some incredible value! I gotta mention also that the re-usable dust tray design is very welcome and superb. I don't have to go out of my way to buy disposable baggies (that's extra hassle and extra cost, and nobody got time for that)
customer_reviews.author: Tim Choi

customer_reviews.title: Expected better from this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Extension nozzle broke off. After cleaning reattaching section together; difficult. It takes extra effort to fasten. I use daily for dog hair. Suction ok, being small it fills quickly & minimize suction until clean. Also, out of replacements filters on Amazon for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: paula hyde

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It kind of gets the job done. I bought it to use as a car vacuum and it worked ok. It kind of got sand and other debris out of my car, but it did not pick up my hair which was frustrating (I shed a lot). The cord is not long, needed an extension cord, and it didn't fit into corners all that great. Also, when cleaning out the filter use gloves, lint and fuzz got stuck to the filter that I had to wipe it off when I emptied it. It's not bad, but it's not anything special. Good for a little refresher between professional car detailing or after a trip to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Clean cat bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I have a 17 lbs cat who enjoys spending his afternoons kicking litter. Even with an enclosed litter box, it's impossible not to have litter all over his bathroom. Thankfully this vac cleans that right up, and doesn't even need an extension cord because the cord that comes with it is plenty long for most in-room jobs. What's to say, a vacuum isn't something to get excited over, but this one is surprisingly powerful, is not annoying to use, and doesn't cost much. If you need to clean up localized detritus on the regular, this seems like a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A handy tool that everyone should own!!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this, so I can't comment on its durability, but it sure is powerful. It was very powerful when we turned it on. As someone else commented in these reviews: You don't get this kind of power with a cordless hand-vac. The cord is quite long, plus it come with an attachable hose (about 18" long) and a brush. These both make it a great option to vacuum out your car. You could probably do your stairs with it. It also comes with a strap so you can wear it over your shoulder. This will be a handy dirt-fighting weapon. For the price, everyone should have one of these!!
customer_reviews.author: ShelbyMary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used the old model from 4-5 yrs ago and it worked great but I eventually burned it up well almost, by taking in water when I knew I was getting another so if it can take on water and keep working its unheard of and that is the old model this one has more powerful suction. Don't use on water unless you have a junker you want to burn out like I am doing, trying to burn that old thing out so I can use this one only, but it just won't break!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Love this little vac.
customer_reviews.text: I was originally going to buy a cordless vac. Needed a small vac for my stairs. It is hard to balance my large vac while doing the stairs. I read a bunch of reviews and everyone said the batteries don't last long in the cordless ones. This little vac is powerful and I am very please with it. Has a nice long cord. Highly recommend it, have been using it for several months now, several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Switch broke in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 90-year-old mother. She has had it less than 3 months and the switch broke. The only way you can turn it on is to use a knife or screwdriver to slide in and push the switch forward. He is almost 91 and has dementia so this is not feasible for her. Very disappointed as she can no longer use it. Waste of her money. Now she has lost the filter housing and they have discontinued almost all the parts for this vacuum. Shame on Amazon for selling something that is being discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful vacuum! Sucks up anything it comes close to! Vacuuming is almost fun now with trying to see what it can suck up and how far away it can be from it. It has an attached extended nose to reach things in tighter crevices and also comes with an attachable hose and brush. Plenty of length on the power cord. Easy to open up the container inside and dump out the dirt. It's exactly what I was looking for in a hand held vacuum and so much cheaper than similar kinds I saw in the store. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in----not the  weak  re-chargeable  type
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from the rechargeable type hand held vacs. Weak suction, and they run out of power in no time. I've owned many of them. They were all junk. This is the one......I'm in the kitchen remodeling business and we generate small amounts of mess daily. And finding an outlet to plug in is never a problem . Royal Dirt Devel they're the best I've seen so far------ SmithConstructionBoulder
customer_reviews.author: TONY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: ??  Disposable vacuum ??  No filter replacements!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum but DD doesn't make replacement filters ( F117) for them. I think they are just dumping the vacuums to get rid of them for some reason. I see similar vacuums by other brands I'm going to look at their filters. See if one of those will work. DD told me to buy an adaptor and another filter. Couldn't make them work! Picture of adaptor next to actual vac part.
customer_reviews.author: G Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best hand held vacuum I have ever owned. I'm over 60 years old so that says a lot :) The suction power is awesome, and the tools are extremely easy to attach and help you get into every little crevice. The cord is nice and long. Because it was relatively inexpensive I was amazed at the quality of this vacuum. I highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Angel PW

customer_reviews.title: I really like this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little guy. I currently bought a small travel camper. It was a pain lugging around my shop vac to clean it after camping. With this little guy, I can quickly vacuum the camper before leaving camp and it's ready to go for the next trip. Light. Very strong. I also use it around the house to vacuum the car. Yah, I also vacuum the car after the camp so my car is clean when I leave the camp ground. I used to lug my upright vacuum to vacuum the stair and breaks my back. This thing made vacuum the stair a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyPig

customer_reviews.title: Does the job on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. I have al hard floors and 3 dogs. We use this instead of a dustpan when sweeping and to get hair/dust of hard to reach places and in corners. It works good but not as good as the old model. I only had to get a new one because my son broke the old one. The old one was more powerful and didn’t need to empty as often. I don’t have any luck on my car carpet with this one bit for the hard surfaces it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: katsum

customer_reviews.title: good for daily use
customer_reviews.text: works well for daily use...but missing a part of it...which seems to be indicated in the instruction manual.. a rotating brush attachment,,,,there was only one hose, with wand... I think it works without needing to recharge it...I LIKE THE PLUG IN CORD. ...so we will see how long this lasts....batter run type of cleaners last only a couple of years..and no longer able to recharge the battery so this may be a better choice...
customer_reviews.author: AKAsun&moon

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product..
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this because dust devil usually has a good name... It did not have much suction I was totally disappointed.. I will not buy their product again...
customer_reviews.author: Ldybtrfly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a hand-vac, but I suspected I'd have to return this one because it was so reasonably priced (cheap). Pleasant surprise! It works great! I should have known better -- my other dirt devil standing vac is still the only vacuum we use at home even though we bought it 13 years ago. This little hand vac is powerful and has worked well both times I've used it. Yes, it's loud, but it cleans quickly, comes with cool attachments (that I didn't even see advertised) and has a long cord. I hope it lasts as long as my other dirt devil. Good job, Dirt Devil team!
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: A good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum to use on my cat tree. It is carpeted, and my long hair cats leave a lot of fur on it. Unfortunately, it doesn’t do very well for this purpose. However, it is great for my parquet floors. I live in an older apartment, and the (original, but not well maintained) parquet floors have large gaps that attract dirt, cat litter, etc. and my upright vacuum doesn’t work well to get it out. However, using the hose attachment with this vacuum, I was able to get out about 90% of the gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Corded, small, & strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little vacuum. I wanted something corded, for longevity, and small. This fit the bill. It has excellent suction, it doesn't have great bristles for removing hair, but there was still plenty in the dirt cup. I just purchased, so I'll update once I've owned for a bit. But currently thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Strohmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Very weak suction and doesn't last more than a few years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based off the rave reviews here; what a disappointment! This lasted a few years before it completely stopped working, but even while it did work I was very annoyed with it's very weak suction. If you wanted a handheld vacuum with good suction, don't get this. This has what I'd call a basic lite suction. Another con is that the pieces that attach keep feeling off and seem to weaken the suction even more. Pros: it's versatile and has a long plug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. Great suction, good size. Strong enough to use on floors, tiles and baseboards....but light enough to pick u pcrunbs off the table. Easy to empty out bag. The only thing to watch out for is to be careful latching the thinner green tube back into place. I broke mine off by putting it away carelessly. It's now annoying to not be able to fine-tune clean in tight spots, but overall he vacuum still works well enough for me to not feel the need to bother replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Junglebird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on-the-spot, and micro cleaning vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the cord is long .... perfect. Not so great is its tendency to overheat, which quite frankly makes sense with such great suction capacity in such a small package. Much better than previous single volted cordless hand held vacs I've owned in the past. It gets everyday use picking up sawdust, small bugs, and a sundry of small dirt particles. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for rabbits!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The debris storage is a little small, but it's easy to empty. It is also very simple, no belts, gears, beaters, or brushes. The cord is also very flexible and long. I use it to clean up after my 2 rabbits. I vacumes up little "pellets" amazing! It also works great for rabbit hair and hay. Way easier than sweeping. Be sure to order an extra filter, as it gets pretty dirty with rabbits. It is pretty loud, so if your rabbits are skittish, be cautious, or make sure they are out of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Shult

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for truckers
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect for truckers. It’s small, but very powerful. Keeps my cab and sleeper clean. If you have an inverter of at least 600 watts continuous, this vac is for you. If you don’t, switch to a company that does (like Averitt’s 1,800 pure sine with APU).
customer_reviews.author: Diantane

customer_reviews.title: It SUCKS... in the best possible way.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much out of this vacuum, as I bought it purely to suck the poo out of my guinea pig cage (as recommended by another reviewer), but I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of power this little vacuum has! For the fleece, it's almost TOO powerful! I do agree with the other reviewer, though--if you are using this for guinea pig cage maintenance, you will definitely need to buy extra filters. I've only been using it for about 2-3 weeks and the filter is already pretty gross.I also think this will be great to use on my stairs, as it is lightweight and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry J.

customer_reviews.title: Toxic-smelling fumes in under 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: In under two minutes, mine smells of burning plastic fumes that give me a headache. :-( My guess is mine has a defective motor that makes its case heat up much, much more quickly than others. I recommend buying one only if you are a well-organized person (I am not, and so I didn't open the parcel in time to return it), and try plugging it in when it arrives. It really does smell bad right away, and the smell is of burning plastic, not dust or dirt, so it's not possible to miss. Another customer did successfully do this -- the box and bag had been opened before, and taped shut again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lorimer

customer_reviews.title: It Works Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great. The motor is a bit loud so I wear ear protectors....which I wear when vacuuming, running the Vitamix, etc. For me, this is much easier to just plug it in and turn it on. I had a battery powered hand held vacuum, and it never held the charge. I use this new one for cleaning my car and also for getting into the crevices of sofa and recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: BEST HANDHELD VAC AROUND!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I LOVE this vacuum!! The suction is amazing, it picks everything up! I love cleaning because of this! It's amazing!!!! Totally worth every penny!! I wish they made this kind of suction in a Dirt Devil upright vacuum! Dont be afraid to buy this!! Actually I came back and bought another one for my business location!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Forbes-Rhoades-

customer_reviews.title: Strong Suction
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love our Dirt Devil Scorpion hand held vacuum. So much so that we bought 2 of them. One for the car and one for the house. Strong vacuum gets it all. light weight, filters that you can re-use with no problem for quite awhile. Crevice tool that is attached and slides out ofo the way if not needed. Great product made well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Boy

customer_reviews.title: hair sticks to the filter and flap really bad, so cleaning it takes way too long for ...
customer_reviews.text: It sorta works, if you are just using it for crumbs on flat surfaces. Honestly, the suction is strong but the range of suction is so small it isn't really worth the trouble. Also, hair sticks to the filter and flap really bad, so cleaning it takes way too long for such a small canister. Cord is long, but I really think the product could have been designed better.
customer_reviews.author: Beings

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the complaints about this device. I find it completely satisfactory. I've vacuumed the car, carpeted stairs and random messes. When you have to clean it out it can be a little gross but it's your dirt. I gently washed the foam part of the filter once and it survived. The cord is long but to make it even more convenient I keep an extension cord attached to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wonky

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this little hand vac has a lot of suction Very powerful and very picks up hair (after a haircut) really well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Really powerful...and loud
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I bought this vacuum to replace a Dirt Devil that I’d owned for years finally died. This vacuum is great...but it’s almost TOO powerful. It has very, very strong suction, and it’s also pretty loud. Turning the unit off is also a little bit tricky. The button is awkward. This product most definitely does what you are buying it to do...it vacuums, with a frenzy. I also bought one for my elderly mom, and she and I both agree that this new Dirt Devil is a force to be reckoned with because of its mighty power.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: ok, but with a few problems
customer_reviews.text: Small & powerful, but there are some shortcomings. Yes I realize it is a small vacuum, but the large motor is matched with an undersized holding bag. If there is very much to clean up, be sure to dump it very often or the "stuff" will prevent the trap from opening. Also, the attachments (including the flip down "extension") fit so poorly they are useless. But I guess they look good from a marketing stand point. Lesson learned. On the up side, the cord is quite long & I am not constantly searching for a new plug. I would suggest you use some sort of cord management.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight piece of c---.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight piece of c---. It flips around, the cord twists, the body easily comes apart when you don't want it to...all in all I would recommend to stay away from this product. I had high hopes for this product for my Airstream trailer but after 2 years of struggling with it I like it even less.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: no replacement filter availability makes its useless
customer_reviews.text: I originally rated this item a 5 because it does work well for the size and price. However, I have not been able to find a replacement filter that is compatible (either though Dirt Devil or another seller) for weeks now, which has made this item essentially useless after ~6 months (depending on how often you change your filter) or whenever you chose to replace the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Marie Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little vacuum! My boyfriend's mom, not so much, as she secretly (attempted) to clean our room with her second-rate piece of garbage. That was the whole reason I decided to try this one out since I was tired of vacuuming our carpet that couldn't even successfully pick up a crumb. I went over our room again and checked the filter, and I was extremely pleased to see all that crap picked up by this tiny yet powerful vacuum! I also don't find it to be much louder than our full-size vacuum. I highly recommend this! Picks up dirt, hair, dust, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I leave it in my bathroom to suck up spilled kitty litter. Without the attachments it is strong enough to pick up the kitty littler, but if I add the brush attachment it doesn't work as well. I haven't tried it for any other purpose like stairs, cars, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Kind of loud & heavy, but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long, so only time will tell whether it holds up long-term. Pleased by its power. It's heavier and louder than a similar (but cordless) Dirt Devil I had for about 5 years. Generous cord length is a plus. I will say this: It's annoying that they change the filter design for each model, meaning that stocking up on replacement filters for my similar old one ended up being a bad idea. I haven't bothered to stock up on filters for this one, just in case. The "quick flip" feature that works as a built-in attachment for crevices is really handy- bought this specifically because I liked that about my old cordless one.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile85

customer_reviews.title: Great little vaccuum.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for my studio apartment. Small enough to put to the side and not get in the way without compromising the vacuum power of the machine due to the size. Works great with cat litter and coffee grounds that get spilled. I even had some gravel stuck in my carpet and it picked that up no problem as well. The attachments are also super useful, the extended hose is great for getting stuff under the fridge and the little cobwebs that develop over time on the ceiling! Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Homeboy Gotcha

customer_reviews.title: Beats lugging the full vacuum out!
customer_reviews.text: I use this a couple times a day to clean up around two very messy birds. It beats lugging the full vacuum out for quick cleanups. It seems to be very powerful and easy to empty/clean out. Great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: Mega Suck and Performance Like a Full-Sized Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were right on target. This handheld vac has almost as much power as my Stand-up vacuum cleaner which also picks up pet hair. I used to own a couple of rechargeable hand-vacs but this has better suction and the built-in crevice tool works perfectly. The cord is long enough for me to do the entire place without the need to unplug and move to another outlet.
customer_reviews.author: H-Spike

customer_reviews.title: Cat owners dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her apartment. She LOVES it! It is used primarily for picking up kitty litter in her bathroom. It works perfectly. She was amazed at what the vacuum picked up. In addition to the kitty litter, it picks up the cat hair, and other debris she couldn't see. Easy to clean too. You won't be disappointed in this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: AZJules

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: It gets hotter then heck. Only used twice. Called CS, she said wasnt really good for cars!!! Tell that to the description........Its such a hassle sending this stuff back.
customer_reviews.author: betmax

customer_reviews.title: Acts like a real vicious Scorpion
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good hand held vacuum for stairs & under couch cushions. I realize we all have high class vacuums with multi tools , but this is much simpler than using Sharks & Hoovers on areas that are crying out for cleaning right in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: AIRBORNECUBFAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small, powerful vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Solid mini vacuum. More powerful than a cordless/battery vacuum, comes with an attachable long hose, upholstery piece, and a shoulder strap. This thing sucks dust, hair, and debris right up, just by putting the hose near a clump or crevice. I haven't tested it, but it definitely feels strong enough to suck up liquid off a floor. Highly recommend this over a battery/cordless one! Those have shorter life expectancy, decreasing battery life, and the power is nowhere close!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Leezy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean out our window frames and to use in our cars. I owned one 40 years ago and it was good but this One is great! Much better Power. I love the piece that bends over and makes it a smaller suction area.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love this Dirt Devil!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed upon first use. I have a battery operated hand vac. I cannot use if for more than 5 minutes without having to recharge and the suction power is very low. This Dirt Devil is awesome. The power cord is long. Love the attachments. The suction power is awesome! It does get warm after several minutes of continual use so just let it cool for a bit. Some complained of the noise. Mine is a little loud but not enough to complain about. I have an upright Dirt Devil that is about 9 years old. It still works great. I love it so much I decided to try the hand vac. I am totally happy with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVED as soon as it arrived
customer_reviews.text: LOVED as soon as it arrived! Used for standard, daily household type stuff....dust bunnies, couches, dust-pan piles, etc. Motor TOTALLY DIED in less than 2 months!! Just totally kaput.....won't even turn on a little bit. Want another one, but reluctant after the experience with this one!
customer_reviews.author: sazino

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil SD20005RED Scorpion Handheld Vacuum Cleaner, Corded, Small, Dry Hand Held Vac With Cord, Red (Design Might Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:Hand VacuumThe Dirt Devil Scorpion Plus Hand Vac delivers Upright Power with Hand Vac convenience. It gives you long lasting performance so you can tackle the biggest messes. Clean tight spots with the QuickFlip Crevice Tool and take less trips to the trash can with the Easy-Empty Dirt Cup. A long 15 foot power cord gives you the freedom to clean complete car interiors and stairs. 7 Amp Motor. Fingertip Controls - Yes.
feature_bullets: Integrated quick flip crevice tool for detail cleaning

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,988 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Upholstery Tool, Dirt Devil Scorpion Quick Flip Corded Bagless Handheld Vacuum, Sliding Brush, Hose, Sd20005Red, Crevice Tool
